Id of a Loan Fund"},"return":"The address of the arbiter for a Loan fund"},"balance(bytes32)":{"params":{"fund":"The Id of a Loan Fund"},"return":"The amount of tokens remaining in Loan Fund"},"calcGlobalInterest()":{"details":"Implementation returns Global Interest Rate per second in RAY          Note: Only updates interest rate if interestUpdateDelay has passed since last update           if utilizationRatio increases newAPR = oldAPR + (min(10%, utilizationRatio) / 10)           if utilizationRatio decreases newAPR = oldAPR - (max(10%, utilizationRatio) / 10)           \u0394APR should be less than or equal to 1%           For every 10% change in utilization ratio, the interest rate will change a maximum of 1%           i.e. newAPR = 11.5% + (10% / 10) = 12.5%     "},"create(uint256,uint256,address,bool,uint256)":{"params":{"amount_":"Amount of tokens to be deposited on creation","arbiter_":"Optional address of arbiter","compoundEnabled_":"Indicator whether typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes32,bytes32[4] memory,bytes32[4] memory,bytes32[4] memory,bytes memory,bytes memory,bytes memory) external returns (bool)

params.fund: The Id of a Loan Fund

arbiter(bytes32).return: The address of the arbiter for a Loan fund

params.fund: The Id of a Loan Fund

balance(bytes32).return: The amount of tokens remaining in Loan Fund

calcGlobalInterest().details: Implementation returns Global Interest Rate per second in RAY          Note: Only updates interest rate if interestUpdateDelay has passed since last update           if utilizationRatio increases newAPR = oldAPR + (min(10%, utilizationRatio) / 10)           if utilizationRatio decreases newAPR = oldAPR - (max(10%, utilizationRatio) / 10)           ΔAPR should be less than or equal to 1%           For every 10% change in utilization ratio, the interest rate will change a maximum of 1%           i.e. newAPR = 11.5% + (10% / 10) = 12.5%

params.amount_: Amount of tokens to be deposited on creation
params.compoundEnabled_: Indicator whether excess funds should be lent on Compound
params.maxLoanDur_: Max Loan Duration of Loan Fund in seconds

create(uint256,uint256,address,bool,uint.return: The Id of a Loan Fund     *         Note: Only one loan fund is allowed per ethereum address.              Exception is made for the deployer for testing.

params.amount_: Amount of tokens to be deposited on creation
params.compoundEnabled_: Indicator whether excess funds should be lent on Compound
params.maxLoanAmt_: Maximum amount of tokens that can be borrowed from Loan Fund
params.maxLoanDur_: Maximum length of loan that can be requested from Loan Fund in seconds
params.minLoanAmt_: Minimum amount of tokens that can be borrowed from Loan Fund
params.minLoanDur_: Minimum length of loan that can be requested from Loan Fund in seconds

createCustom(uint256,uint256,uint256,uin.return: The Id of a Loan Fund     *         Note: Only one loan fund is allowed per ethereum address.              Exception is made for the deployer for testing.

custom(bytes32).return: The indicator of whether a Loan Fund is custom or not

params.collateral_: Amount of collateral to deposit in satoshis
params.fund: The Id of a Loan Fund
params.loanDur_: Length of loan request in seconds
params.pubKeyA_: Borrower Bitcoin public key to use for refunding collateral
params.pubKeyB_: Lender Bitcoin public key to use for refunding collateral     *        Note: Borrower client should verify params after Ethereum tx             confirmation before locking Bitcoin.
params.secretHashes_: 4 Borrower Secret Hashes and 4 Lender Secret Hashes

setCompound(address,address).details: Enables assets in loan fund that haven't been borrowed to be lent on Compound

params.cToken_: The address of the Compound Token
params.comptroller_: The address of the Compound Comptroller

arbiter(bytes32).notice: Get the arbiter for a Loan Fund

balance(bytes32).notice: Get the current balance of a Loan Fund in tokens

calcGlobalInterest().notice: Calculate and update Global Interest Rate

create(uint256,uint256,address,bool,uint.notice: Lenders create Loan Fund using Global Protocol parameters and deposit assets

createCustom(uint256,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Lenders create Loan Fund using Custom parameters and deposit assets

custom(bytes32).notice: Get the custom indicator for a Loan Fund

decreaseTotalBorrow(uint256).notice: Decrease Total Borrow by Loans contract

deposit(bytes32,uint256).notice: Lenders deposit tokens in Loan Fund

fee(bytes32).notice: Get the optional automation fee for a Loan Fund

fundExpiry(bytes32).notice: Get maximum loan duration able to be requested by a 'borrower'

generate(bytes32[]).notice: Submit secretHashes to be used with future loans

interest(bytes32).notice: Get the interest rate for a Loan Fund

lender(bytes32).notice: Get the lender of a Loan Fund

liquidationRatio(bytes32).notice: Get the liquidation ratio of a Loan Fund

maxLoanAmt(bytes32).notice: Get maximum loan amount able to be requested by a 'borrower'

maxLoanDur(bytes32).notice: Get maximum loan duration able to be requested by a 'borrower'

minLoanAmt(bytes32).notice: Get minimum loan amount able to be requested by a 'borrower'

minLoanDur(bytes32).notice: Get minimum loan duration able to be requested by a 'borrower'

penalty(bytes32).notice: Get the liquidation penalty rate for a Loan Fund

request(bytes32,address,uint256,uint256,.notice: Lenders request loan from Loan Fund on behalf of Borrower

setPubKey(bytes).notice: Set Lender or Arbiter Bitcoin Public Key

updateCustom(bytes32,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Users update custom Loan Fund settings

withdraw(bytes32,uint256).notice: Lenders withdraw tokens in Loan Fund
